meanings.definition: Identify the nature of (an illness or other problem) by examination of the symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the flu quickly.
meanings.sent2: She was diagnosed with a cold last week.
meanings.sent3: The detective diagnosed the case of the missing cookies.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic diagnosed the car trouble with a single glance.

meanings.definition: Recognize (a disease or problem) by its symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The vet diagnosed the dog's illness.
meanings.sent2: He was diagnosed with a broken arm after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The chef diagnosed the burnt dinner as a culinary disaster.
meanings.sent4: His smile diagnosed his excitement for the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The teacher diagnosed the student's confusion and offered help.
